comments.author: rwaldhof
comments.body: *** HTTPCLIENT-29 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

comments.author: rwaldhof
comments.body:
> It would be nice to provide a cookie 
> filter interface, so the user can change 
> the cookie policy by implementing his own filter.

Can you sketch out what you're thinking of in this part?

comments.author: oleg.kalnichevski@bearingpoint.com
comments.body: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 10797 ***

description:
User need a way to control what cookie can be accepted and what should be 
rejected. It would be nice to provide a cookie filter interface, so the user 
can change the cookie policy by implementing his own filter.
summary: user need a way to control cookie policy
